points.description: Good: No CDPS permitted facilities upstream of the project reach. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

Fair: CDPS permitted facilities comprise a low to moderate percentage of the baseflow in the project reach AND no facilities are located within 2 miles upstream of project reach. (Suggested index range 0.40-0.69)

Poor: CDPS permitted facilities comprise a high percentage of the baseflow in the project reach OR 1 or more facilities present within 2 miles upstream of project reach have a high potential to threaten aquatic life. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.39)
